content: Listen to the Cop Haters on CNN guess this is Pepsi humor too ? Listen to Kamau Bell and Don Lemon Yuck it up about Cop saying ‘Guess I won’t Kill Anybody Today’ after being offered a Pepsi. I suppose CNN Media thinks it humorous to parody-denigrate police officers, insinuate they are KILLERS unless offered a Pepsi ? pepsi_(new).mp4Listen to Kamau Bell and Don Lemon on CNN Yuck it up about Cop saying ‘Guess I Won’t Kill Anybody Today’
